summary: Issue affecting SOF storage used for /gws/nopw/j04/* workspaces & CEDA archive.

updates.details: Some GWS volumes permitting writes beyond true quota and becoming full. Check mon.jasmin.ac.uk for true quota (df may report wrong value). Issue being investigated with storage vendor.
